name: part_011
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア3D新ビジュアルお披露目】お待たせ！！君に早く会いたかったよ！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [BB2zYMB-1G4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare continues her 3D new visual reveal with a performance of the song 'Serenade'.

subtitles.original: …君になって
subtitles.english: ...becoming you,

subtitles.original: 強くて弱い心
subtitles.english: a heart that is strong yet weak.

subtitles.original: 時には寂しがるけど
subtitles.english: Though it sometimes feels lonely,

subtitles.original: 君が笑うと
subtitles.english: whenever you smile,

subtitles.original: それだけでも嬉しくて
subtitles.english: that alone makes me so happy

subtitles.original: 全てが報われるんだ
subtitles.english: that it makes everything feel worthwhile.

subtitles.original: 俯いてた日は
subtitles.english: On the days I was looking down,

subtitles.original: ここから見てたのはぬかるみ
subtitles.english: all I saw from here was the mud,

subtitles.original: でも今は空を見上げてる
subtitles.english: but now I'm looking up at the sky.

subtitles.original: 途方に暮れる背中に
subtitles.english: To your back that seems so lost,

subtitles.original: 言葉を掛けたいけど
subtitles.english: I want to reach out with words, but...

subtitles.original: 土砂降りに濡れた肩を
subtitles.english: Your shoulders drenched in the downpour—

subtitles.original: すぐにも抱きたいけれど
subtitles.english: I want to hold you right away, but...

subtitles.original: いつもいつでも求めていてくれなくていい
subtitles.english: You don't have to need me all the time.

subtitles.original: どんな日も君を知ってる
subtitles.english: I know the real you, no matter the day.

subtitles.original: 心の鍵を開けるのは 強い力じゃなく
subtitles.english: What unlocks the heart isn't brute force,

subtitles.original: 真っ直ぐに想う気持ち
subtitles.english: but feelings that are straightforward and true.

subtitles.original: 君が笑うと
subtitles.english: Whenever you smile,

subtitles.original: それだけでも嬉しくて
subtitles.english: that alone makes me so happy

subtitles.original: 全てが報われるんだ
subtitles.english: that it makes everything feel worthwhile.

subtitles.original: 俯いてた日は
subtitles.english: On the days I was looking down,

subtitles.original: ここから見てたのはぬかるみ
subtitles.english: all I saw from here was the mud,

subtitles.original: でも今は空を見上げてる
subtitles.english: but now I'm looking up at the sky.

subtitles.original: 今日も頑張ろう
subtitles.english: Let's do our best today too.

subtitles.original: 負けない強さを持とう
subtitles.english: Let's have the strength to never give up,

subtitles.original: 愛する人のためにも
subtitles.english: for the sake of the ones we love.
